metadata.title: Friday, 30th October, 2015
metadata.session: FIFTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    whether the Government is aware that the hunger situation in Sikongo District has deteriorated due to crop failure;
(b)    if so, when additional relief food will be sent to the District;
(c)    whether it is Government policy to provide relief food only on production of Voter’s Cards; and
(d)    if it is not, when the Government will stop the practice which is prevailing in Sikongo District.

questions.minister: Vice President what measures the Government is taking to accelerate development in Masaiti, Mpongwe and Lufwanyama Districts, which have lagged behind in development, compared to the rest of the districts in the Copperbelt Province.
questions.question_text: ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Estimates of Revenue and Expenditure (Including Capital and Constitutional and Statutory Expenditure): Committee of Supply. Heads 19/01, 03/01, 68/01, 68/02, 68/03, 68/04, 68/05, 68/06, 06/01 and 09/01 - for consideration. KEY TO HEADS OF EXPENDITURE Head 19    -    Disaster Management and Mitigation Unit Head 03    -    National Assembly Head 68    -    Ministry of Tourism and Arts Head 06    -    Public Service Commission - Office of the President Head 09    -    Teaching Service Commission - Office of the President
